channel.title: CVE Feed for Avaya -- Call Management System Supervisor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Avaya -- Call Management System Supervisor

item.title: CVE-2018-15615|2024-08-05T10:01:54.243Z -- avaya -- call%20management%20system%20supervisor
item.description: A vulnerability in the Supervisor component of Avaya Call Management System allows local administrative user to extract sensitive information from users connecting to a remote CMS host. Affected versions of CMS Supervisor include R17.0.x and R18.0.x.
